Name.label: Autosomal dominant hereditary demyelinating motor and sensory neuropathy

TextSection.Contents: Hereditary thermosensitive neuropathy is a rare, demyelinating, hereditary motor and sensory neuropathy characterized by reversible episodes of ascending muscle weakness, paresthesias and areflexia triggered by a febrile episode, with or without pressure palsy.

Name.label: E (exact mapping (the terms and the concepts are equivalent))
